head.title: School Closure Information - Lamphere Schools

meta.content:
We've put together this page in an effort to make a "one-stop" for all information related to the school closing. As more information becomes available we will add it here. If you have suggestions of items we can add, what would be helpful to you, please email to berlinj@lamphereschools.org and we'll do our best to track down the info and get it added.
Thank you for making our Lamphere Community the best around. We are all in this together and we will get through this together. #wearelamphere

span.span: We've put together this page in an effort to make a "one-stop" for all information related to the school closing. As more information becomes available we will add it here. If you have suggestions of items we can add, what would be helpful to you, please email to berlinj@lamphereschools.org and we'll do our best to track down the info and get it added.
